misc

Class MiscParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • misc.MiscParameters

  • public class MiscParameters
extends java.lang.Object
    Container for all misc simulator parameters.
    Author:
    Maitreyi Nanjanath, Cameron Skinner

        public boolean shouldBuryAgent(Building b)
        Find out if an agent inside a building should be buried due to collapse.
        Parameters:
        b - The building to check.
        Returns:
        True if an agent inside the building should be buried, false otherwise.
